name: Swirvv 1.2
description:
Update log:

---------------------------------

Bug fixes:

-Partially fixed the corner bug

-Scores and coins are saved.

-Advanced mode & Cosmetics

-Added prices and coin requirements

Side note: This game will now only be android compatible due to an error in exporting the game. The windows version of the game will most likely be fixed in a few hours however, PC players can play now at https://sites.google.com/view/swirvv
